translations: 最健康的（sound 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: Played only once, betrayal of the other is the soundest choice.
sentences.translation: 如果只玩一次，背叛对手是最合理的选择。

sentences.sentence: I believe that it is the soundest approach to keep us on intimate terms.
sentences.translation: 我相信这种开明的方法能够让我们保持亲密的关系。

sentences.sentence: Canada, at least, has the benefit of one of the world's soundest banking systems.
sentences.translation: 加拿大，至少还可以从它全球最好的银行糸统之一中获益。
